( #{item.yghmcid},#{item.yglzid},cast(#{item.rzrq} as date),cast(#{item.lzrq} as date),#{item.lrry},LOCALTIMESTAMP ,'0' )
mapper.select: select yglzxx.yghmcid,yglzxx.yglzid,yglzxx.rzrq,yglzxx.lzrq,case when fj.zywid is not null then '1' else '0' end fjbj from matridx_yglzxx yglzxx left join matridx_fjcfb fj on fj.zywid=yglzxx.yglzid and fj.scbj='0' where yglzxx.yghmcid = #{yghmcid} and yglzxx.scbj ='0' group by yglzxx.yghmcid,yglzxx.yglzid,yglzxx.rzrq,yglzxx.lzrq,fj.zywid order by yglzxx.rzrq
